engagement_recommendations.title: LinkedIn Social Selling
engagement_recommendations.recommendation: Engage with their LinkedIn content and thought leadership
tactics: Share their content with value-add commentary
Connect with GTM leaders at the company

engagement_recommendations.title: Developer Community Engagement
tactics: Contribute to their open source projects

priority_actions.why: Generic outreach won't resonate with innovative fintech
priority_actions.how: Use intelligence insights to craft company-specific messaging

priority_actions.action: Map key stakeholders and decision makers

talking_points.point: Congrats on the growth - I saw you're now at 7500 employees
talking_points.follow_up: How is your team handling the scaling challenges?
talking_points.context: Use when discussing growth or team expansion
